root.name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Portable 2
root.description: OverviewThe second title from the Umineko no Naku Koro ni series of visual novels by 07th Expansion to be released on the PSP, this game is a port of Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Majo to Suiri no Rinbukyoku originally released for the Playstation 3 in 2010. It features the third and fourth episodes of the visual novels, Banquet of the Golden Witch and Alliance of the Golden Witch.
